column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Sammie K. - Thank you for your review. First and foremost
column2: I regret that you did not enjoy your experience at JINYA. I agree that your server failed his duty by not being able to explain the ingredients to our ramen bowls
column3: and for that I apologize. Based on your review
column4: may I ask if you selected the "Mild" or "Spicy" level for your Spicy Chicken Ramen? The "Mild" option means we do not add any of our signature chili paste or hot sauce
column5: which can be found on the table
column6: but we do add a small amount of chili oil to the bean sprouts as that gives the item more flavor.
